com.bigdata.journal

Class WORMStrategy.StoreCounters<T extends WORMStrategy.StoreCounters<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.counters.striped.StripedCounters<T>
      • com.bigdata.journal.WORMStrategy.StoreCounters<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Enclosing class:
    WORMStrategy

    public static class WORMStrategy.StoreCounters<T extends WORMStrategy.StoreCounters<T>>
extends StripedCounters<T>
    Striped performance counters for IRawStore access, including operations that read or write through to the underlying media.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

      The size of the largest record written.
      long ndiskRead
      #of read requests that read through to the backing file.

      #of write requests that write through to the backing file.

      #of times the length of the file was changed (typically, extended).

      #of write requests.
